modName: He Needs SOME MILK - Unrelenting Force Replacement
summary: A shout overhaul, replacing the default Unrelenting Force "FUS RO DAH" with "HE NEEDS SOME MILK."
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#c27ba0][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]A replacement of the Dragonborn's default Unrelenting Force shout[/font]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]
[/size][/font][/color][font=Tahoma][size=2]So instead of saying "FUS RO DAH" the Dragonborn will now say "HE NEEDS SOME MILK," a phrase made popular by Vine and Youtube.

[/size][/font][color=#d5a6bd]It's kinda funny if you ask me.[/color]

[color=#d5a6bd]I've offered two files, one that overhauls the voice of both female and male shout and one that only overhauls female. [/color]
[color=#c27ba0]
[b]If you are manually installing[/b][/color][color=#d5a6bd] place the sound folder in the data folder (located wherever your Skyrim folder is installed) [/color]

[/center]
author: me
